summary.title: Soil Analysis Summary
summary.acidic_low_sand: Acidic sandy soil with low organic matter. Requires lime and compost addition.
summary.acidic_low_loam: Acidic loamy soil with low fertility. Add lime and organic fertilizers.
summary.acidic_low_clay: Acidic clay soil with low organic content. Improve drainage and add lime.
summary.acidic_medium_sand: Acidic sandy soil with moderate fertility. Good for acid-loving crops.
summary.acidic_medium_loam: Acidic loamy soil with moderate organic matter. Suitable for rice and tea.
summary.acidic_medium_clay: Acidic clay soil with moderate fertility. Good water retention for rice.
summary.acidic_high_sand: Acidic sandy soil rich in organic matter. Excellent for blueberries and potatoes.
summary.acidic_high_loam: Acidic loamy soil with high fertility. Ideal for tea and vegetables.
summary.acidic_high_clay: Acidic clay soil rich in organic matter. Perfect for rice cultivation.
summary.neutral_low_sand: Neutral sandy soil with low organic matter. Add compost for better fertility.
summary.neutral_low_loam: Neutral loamy soil with low fertility. Requires organic matter addition.
summary.neutral_low_clay: Neutral clay soil with low organic content. Improve with compost.
summary.neutral_medium_sand: Neutral sandy soil with moderate fertility. Good for groundnuts and vegetables.
summary.neutral_medium_loam: Neutral loamy soil with moderate organic matter. Ideal for most crops.
summary.neutral_medium_clay: Neutral clay soil with moderate fertility. Suitable for wheat and cotton.
summary.neutral_high_sand: Neutral sandy soil rich in organic matter. Excellent for vegetables and melons.
summary.neutral_high_loam: Neutral loamy soil with high fertility. Perfect for wheat, maize, and vegetables.
summary.neutral_high_clay: Neutral clay soil rich in organic matter. Ideal for wheat and sugarcane.
summary.alkaline_low_sand: Alkaline sandy soil with low organic matter. Add sulfur and compost.
summary.alkaline_low_loam: Alkaline loamy soil with low fertility. Requires acidification and organic matter.
summary.alkaline_low_clay: Alkaline clay soil with low organic content. Add sulfur and improve drainage.
summary.alkaline_medium_sand: Alkaline sandy soil with moderate fertility. Suitable for cotton and sorghum.
summary.alkaline_medium_loam: Alkaline loamy soil with moderate organic matter. Good for cotton and barley.
summary.alkaline_medium_clay: Alkaline clay soil with moderate fertility. Suitable for cotton cultivation.
summary.alkaline_high_sand: Alkaline sandy soil rich in organic matter. Good for cotton and sugarbeet.
summary.alkaline_high_loam: Alkaline loamy soil with high fertility. Ideal for cotton and sorghum.
summary.alkaline_high_clay: Alkaline clay soil rich in organic matter. Perfect for cotton and wheat.
